text: Property Is No Longer a Theft () is a 1973 Italian French comedy movie directed by Elio Petri and starring Ugo Tognazzi, Flavio Bucci, Daria Nicolodi, Salvo Randone, Mario Scaccia, Julien Guiomar, Jacques Herlin, Gigi Proietti. ==Other websites== * Category:1973 comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Elio Petri
title: Property Is No Longer a Theft
